GSD.description:
scsi: mpt3sas: Fix out-of-bounds compiler warning

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.6 by commit f03efd4d4dd89ac72c246ea2eaed137a2d7ddd26. For more details please see the references link.
